sentences.en: A performance like that makes me want to heave up.
sentences.cn: 那样的表演真叫我恶心.

sentences.en: After some calculations , however, he could only heave a sigh.
sentences.cn: 可是盘算一下, 只好叹口气.

sentences.en: Alan heaved his suitcase onto his bed.
sentences.cn: 艾伦把他的手提箱拖到床上。

sentences.en: Captain Cornish repeated his order to heave to.
sentences.cn: 科尼什船长再次下达了停航的命令。

sentences.en: He gave the discus a tremendous heave.
sentences.cn: 他猛一使劲掷出铁饼.

sentences.en: He managed to grasp the metal, get a firm grip of it and heave his body upwards.
sentences.cn: 他设法牢牢抓住了那个金属物，把整个身子往上提。

sentences.en: Heave ho ! ( sailor's cries when pulling at ropes or cables )
sentences.cn: 用力拉呀! ( 水手拉绳或缆时的呼声 )

sentences.en: Heave the box onto the top shelf.
sentences.cn: 把这个箱子举到最上面一层搁板上.

sentences.en: Heave the rocks into the ravine.
sentences.cn: 把这些石头扔进深谷里.

sentences.en: I bury my face in my hands and heave a sigh.
sentences.cn: 我掩着面叹息.

sentences.en: I managed to heave the trunk down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我用力把箱子弄下楼梯。

sentences.en: If you don't leave the flat, you'll get the heave - ho again.
sentences.cn: 要是明天你还不离开这套房间, 你又要再次给撵走啦.

sentences.en: It took five strong men to heave the statue up a ramp and lower it into place.
sentences.cn: 靠了5个强壮的男子才将雕像拉上坡道，再下放到合适的位置。

sentences.en: It took only one heave to hurl him into the river.
sentences.cn: 只一推，就把他推进了河里。

sentences.en: John heaved the metal bar over the fence.
sentences.cn: 约翰把金属棒扔过了篱笆。

sentences.en: Michael’s shoulders heaved with silent laughter.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔憋着不笑出声来，双肩直抖。

sentences.en: The brig hove to.
sentences.cn: 双桅横帆船顶风停下

sentences.en: The brig hove to.
sentences.cn: 双桅横帆船顶风停下

sentences.en: The sea heaved up and down beneath the boat.
sentences.cn: 船的下面大海波涛汹涌。

sentences.en: There was a roar that seemed to make the pavement heave.
sentences.cn: 这时一声轰隆,仿佛要把人行道掀起来似的.

sentences.en: they held out until a British fleet hove in sight.
sentences.cn: 他们一直坚持到一支英国舰队进入视野。

sentences.en: We heave him onto the platform.
sentences.cn: 我们把他抬起送到站台上.

words.tran_cn: 挑夫，[机] 杠杆；举起物件的装置；举起者
举起；起伏；投掷；一阵呕吐

phrases.phrase: heave into sight 或 heave into view
phrases.tran_cn: 看见，出现：出现或看上去要出现在地平线进入视野，如一条船
将引擎动力船向风停位：在与上条类似的境况中转动机动船，以便船首吃进水中同时以低速向前航行

trans.tran_en: a strong rising or falling movement
to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort

trans.tran_cn: 起伏，（山丘等）隆起，拖，气喘
trans.tran_en: to move up and down with very strong movements
to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort
